entry.title: Brexit Has Changed Celtic’s Transfer Focus … And Very Much For The Better.

entry.title: Last Chance Saloon for Celtic Star
entry.summary: Mickey Johnston has been at Celtic since 2008, rising through the ranks to the first team. He’s failed to consistently impress fans, with injuries constantly sidelining the winger. entry.title: Report: Celtic 'not looking' to sign Jordan Larsson as transfer stance is revealed
entry.summary: Celtic are reportedly not looking at Swedish striker Jordan Larsson as an option during this summer’s transfer window. entry.title: Jordan Larsson to Celtic Not Happening – Report
entry.summary: Celtic had received contact from Jordan Larsson’s agents. However, despite his interest in the club, the player has made a u-turn deciding he would not wish to join the Scottish champions. entry.title: Celtic’s lack of depth in defence showed just how threadbare we are
entry.summary: It’s probably unwise to read too much into the performances or results of pre-season friendly encounters, but Celtic’s entertaining and fiercely competitive 3-3 draw with Rapid Vienna encapsulated Celtic’s current state of affairs both defensively and offensively. From middle to front Celtic looked a side capable of going to-to-toe with both domestic and European rivals Read More
